meanings.sent1: The mapper drew a detailed map of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The talented mapper used various tools to create a map of the city.
meanings.sent3: The mapper accidentally made a map of their living room instead of the city.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a skilled mapper, charting out the best route to take.
meanings.sent5: The mapper's map was so accurate that everyone marveled at its precision.

meanings.definition: A tool or software used for creating maps.
meanings.sent1: The explorer relied on a reliable mapper to navigate through the dense forest.
meanings.sent2: The new version of the mapper software included advanced features for better map creation.
meanings.sent3: The mapper tool decided to take a break and refused to draw any more maps.
meanings.sent4: The mapper software was a beacon of light in the sea of confusing data.
meanings.sent5: Using the mapper, she was able to plot out the perfect route for her road trip.
